Introduction: The plant is an annual or short-lived shrubby perennial herb. It is slightly pubescent  with green to dark violet shoots and oval to broad oval leaves that are often dark violet as well. Datura metel is one of the 50 fundamental herbs used in traditional Chinese medicine.

Traditional medicinal systems of the Indian subcontinent countries as well as tribal practitioners consider the plant to have diverse medicinal values. Scientific evidences have validated most of the claims of the ethnomedicinal uses  including that of treatment of sN/Ake bite with the plant.
Broad spectrum medicinal properties makes it the most important constituent of ayurvedic medicine. Has very high vitamin C content.

Tinospora is a well known medicinal plant and used to cure a number of diseases in combination with other plants with brand ammes Geriforte  Diabecon4 etc. More than hundred patents have been found on its medicinal application such as an antiallergic59  and for cancer60 etc.

Boerhaavia diffusa is a species of flowering plant in the four o clock family.It is taken in herbal medicine for pain relief and other uses. The leaves of Boerhaavia diffusa are often used as a green vegetable in many parts of Asia  Africa  Europe. It is commonly found in Afria  Asia  North America  Carribean  South America  South Pacific.

Dried fruits are used orally to get relief from cough; decoction of dried flower is given with jaggery as an anti-fertility agent in females; and leaf juice is applied externally on ringworm and other skin diseases.

Ginger is in the family Zingiberaceae and is widely used as a spice and a folk medicine. It is a herbaceous perennial which grows annual pseudostems (false stems made of the rolled bases of leaves) about one meter tall bearing Narrow leaf blades. The inflorescences bear flowers having pale yellow petals with purple edges  and arise directly from the rhizome on separate shoots.
Jatropha curcas is a species of flowering plant in the spurge family  Euphorbiaceae  that is native to the American tropics  most likely Mexico and Central America.

Bael is the only member of the monotypic genus Aegle. It is a deciduous shrub or small to medium-sized tree  with slender drooping branches and rather open  irregular crown. Each of its part has a different use and different taste
